metadata.title: CVE-2021-20282 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.description: When creating a user account, it was possible to verify the account withouthaving access to the verification email link/secret in moodle before3.10.2, 3.9.5, 3.8.8, 3.5.17.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
